# oui-noti-button

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                    | Type     | Default  |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------ | -------- | -------- |
| `count`  | `count`   | Number of unread notifications | `number` | `0`      |
| `icon`   | `icon`    | Set the noti-try status icon   | `string` | `"read"` |
